about_the_game:
Lost in the woods. Alone in the dark. And hunted by a killer. Step into the shoes of one woman as she navigates a web of terror and deceit to uncover the truth behind a string of disappearances. With engaging storylines, heart-pumping action, and bone-chilling suspense, this gripping visual novel game will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

Featuring full audio narration, you'll feel like you're part of the story with every word. Autoplay mode offers an audio book experience that immerses you in the story, while normal play allows for a more casual visual novel experience.

With unexpected twists and turns, this game is a must-play for fans of psychological thrillers and horror novels. Will you be able to survive the terror and uncover the truth?

name: Hunting The Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3ghz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3ghz +
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
